Action.author: anikitindsr
Action.body: Need to test upgrade from 1.2.301 to 1.2.302 (Simple upgrade, without forcing)

Action.author: ozheregelya
Action.body: 1.2.302, QALive pool (7+18 nodes) Steps to Validate: 1. Setup the pool of 7 nodes with 1.2.301 version. 2. Add 18 nodes to the pool. 3. Schedule upgrade to version 1.2.302 with force=False. Actual Results: Upgrade successfully completed on all nodes. Additional Information: Upgrade from previous stable works only with force=true, when all nodes upgraded at the same time. >
